1.0.name: wordpress/mj-news
1.0.description:
MJ news plugin is a simple and easy to integreate with any design and easy to change in coding as per requirement and easy to handle . client can easy integrate this. these are some of features that this plugin consist. mj news provide you totally different section to enter news in wordpress. it also has different category section apart from wordpress post category. take care of one think while installing this or any plugin that your header.php file should consist wp_head(); function and footer file should consist wp_footer(); else any jquery and javascript of css file will not be included and plugin will not work in your wordpress.

  • - latest news as post.
  • - category news.
  • - news tags.
  • - Pagination
  • - custom fields.
  • - easy to install.
  • - easy to integrate with any html design
  • - easy to change html formate as per design requirement.
  • - easy to call using two method one is using shortcode [
